about_the_game:
Play as Sun Wukong in this zen, stylized, 3D, sliding-block puzzle game as you go on a journey to obtain the legendary Golden Peach of Healing in order to heal your sick relative!

-This game has 7 unique levels. Collect every peach in a level in order to cross the gate into the next one. There's also a secret in each level that are used to piece together a secret story. Can you collect them all?

-This game has a grid-based movement system. Press the arrow buttons on the bottom right of the screen to move in the desired direction.

-Click and drag the screen to rotate the camera.

-Monkey can't cross water! Use blocks to cross the water by pushing them into it and create a bridge!

-Made a mistake? Don't worry! On the top right of the screen, there's an undo button to go back a move. If you hold down that button, it reveals options to move back several moves at a time, including restarting the level.

-To the left of the undo button is a grid button that toggles a grid on/off! The grid helps see the puzzles easier.
detailed_description:
Play as Sun Wukong in this zen, stylized, 3D, sliding-block puzzle game as you go on a journey to obtain the legendary Golden Peach of Healing in order to heal your sick relative!

-This game has 7 unique levels. Collect every peach in a level in order to cross the gate into the next one. There's also a secret in each level that are used to piece together a secret story. Can you collect them all?

-This game has a grid-based movement system. Press the arrow buttons on the bottom right of the screen to move in the desired direction.

-Click and drag the screen to rotate the camera.

-Monkey can't cross water! Use blocks to cross the water by pushing them into it and create a bridge!

-Made a mistake? Don't worry! On the top right of the screen, there's an undo button to go back a move. If you hold down that button, it reveals options to move back several moves at a time, including restarting the level.

-To the left of the undo button is a grid button that toggles a grid on/off! The grid helps see the puzzles easier.

name: Garden of Táozi

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1690 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1690 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: In this stylized, 3D sliding block puzzle adventure, play as a cute version of Sun Wukong as he goes on a quest to collect the legendary Golden Peach of Healing! Push blocks and collect peaches to progress forward!
